HeroSection.welcomeText: Welcome to the “Tamarieli” Association and platform “Earthoba”
HeroSection.inspiration: Inspiration: The Golden Age of Queen Tamar

BasicPrinciples.title: Basic Principles
BasicPrinciples.communication: Communication: Sharing experiences, knowledge, and perspectives.
BasicPrinciples.interaction: Interaction: Encouraging personal and team-based creative processes.
BasicPrinciples.culturalExchange: Fruitful cultural interaction: Creative collaboration that strengthens understanding between cultures.

DigitalLibrary.title: Digital Library 'Ciblus'
DigitalLibrary.subtitle: The global face of Georgian culture and literature
DigitalLibrary.point1: The 'Tamarieli' Digital Library is being created to preserve, protect, and make accessible the treasures of Georgian culture and literature — in a modern digital format.
DigitalLibrary.point2: Our mission is for the Georgian word to become a bridge between Georgia and the world. The project aims to preserve national memory, promote Georgian literature globally, create educational resources, and strengthen cultural diplomacy.
DigitalLibrary.point3: The 'Tamarieli' Library will be an open and friendly digital space where readers, researchers, students, and teachers unite around one goal — to preserve and spread Georgian cultural heritage.
DigitalLibrary.point4: This is a people's project — a digital bridge between past and future, built on trust, knowledge, and values, where the Georgian word lives without borders.

Foreword.title: Foreword
Foreword.point1: The Tamarieli Association is founded on the promotion and representation of art, literature, Georgian dance, and other creative activities.
Foreword.point2: The Tamarieli Association regards culture, art, creativity, and history as tools for communication and for building constructive cultural connections that foster civil society development.
Foreword.point3: The Association creates an open, inclusive, and innovative space where traditional and modern art coexist in an interactive relationship.

InovateProjects.title: Innovative Projects
InovateProjects.point1: The Tamarieli Association awaits your innovative projects in the fields of culture, education, and digital development.
InovateProjects.point2: Project authors will have the opportunity to collaborate with the Association to receive co-funding, mentorship, and project promotion.
InovateProjects.point3: Our goal is to support initiatives that promote Georgian culture, literature, and knowledge through a modern, innovative vision.

Mission.title: Mission
Mission.point1: Professional support for art and culture for artists of all ages.
Mission.point2: Encouraging creativity and stimulating the creative process.
Mission.point3: Promoting cultural diversity and fostering constructive cultural cooperation (targeted, fruitful, and socially beneficial relations between cultures).
Mission.point4: Creating a communication platform for intercultural activities: exhibitions, festivals, performances.
Mission.point7: International partnerships: EU, cultural centers, NGOs.

SocialResponsibility.title: Social Responsibility
SocialResponsibility.point1: Engaging and involving local communities through creative activities.
SocialResponsibility.point2: Art as a tool for self-expression, social engagement, and integration.
SocialResponsibility.point3: An open space for European citizens and international partners.
SocialResponsibility.point4: Supporting public diplomacy and constructive cultural relations.

TamarieliDesc.title: Tamarieli

list.inspiration: Inspiration — The Golden Age of Queen Tamar

TamarieliDesc.paragraph: The Tamarieli Association is a platform for culture and arts, combining tradition, innovation, and constructive cultural interaction, strengthening collaboration at European and international levels.

Targets.title: Targets
Targets.point1: Promoting cultural diversity through events, exhibitions, and festivals.
Targets.point2: Supporting and showcasing young and experienced artists.
Targets.point3: Promoting traditional dance and music alongside modern interpretations.
Targets.point5: Developing international cultural relations and collaborations.

EarthobaPlatform.title: The Unified Platform of the
EarthobaPlatform.point1: Bringing National Interests to the International Arena
EarthobaPlatform.point2: Coordinated Action to Achieve a Common Goal
EarthobaPlatform.direction2: Advocating for the issue of political prisoners
EarthobaPlatform.direction5: Supporting free media and civil society
EarthobaPlatform.direction6: Partnership with the European Union and international democratic institutions
EarthobaPlatform.direction7: Coordinated campaigns, rallies, petitions, panel discussions
EarthobaPlatform.valuesDescription: Our 'Earthoba' constantly maintains impartiality and independence. It acts in practice and not only in formal agreements.

ContactForm.description: You can send us a message
ContactForm.name: Name

AllBooks.noBooks: No books found with the selected filters

ThinCreateInspire.title: THINK, CREATE, INSPIRE
ThinCreateInspire.point3: Association 'Tamarieli' is waiting for your innovative projects in the fields of culture, education, and digital development.
ThinCreateInspire.point4: Project authors will have the opportunity to receive co-funding, mentorship support, and project promotion. Our goal is to support initiatives that serve the dissemination of Georgian culture, literature, and knowledge with a modern innovative vision.

VoicePlatform.title: Voice+
VoicePlatform.point1: Association 'Tamarieli' and the unified platform of the Georgian diaspora 'Earthoba' serve to strengthen the Georgian diaspora worldwide, preserve cultural identity, and support Georgia's Euro-integration processes.
VoicePlatform.point2: Our joint vision is based on media as an effective instrument of freedom of speech, diplomacy, cultural dialogue, and public development, aiming to present Georgia on the international stage.
VoicePlatform.point3: Association 'Tamarieli' offers partners an ethical and neutral media platform, a wide international audience, joint campaigns, thematic content, participation in events, and access to reliable sources.

gallery.title: GALLERY | ART SPACE GALLERY | ART SPAC
gallery.desc: Gallery Art Space is a contemporary, open, and inclusive cultural platform that brings together traditional and modern art within an innovative, dialogue-driven environment. The space is dedicated to supporting artists, stimulating creative processes, and strengthening intercultural cooperation at local, European, and international levels. Gallery Art Space serves as a meeting point for ideas, experimentation, and cultural diplomacy — where art becomes a language of communication, mutual understanding, and shared values. Think. Create. Inspire. cooperation at local, European, and international levels. cooperation at local, European, and international levels. music.title: MUSIC SONUS | MUSIC PLATFORM
music.desc1: Music Sonus is a contemporary, refined, and inclusive music platform that brings together diverse musical genres within a single space.The platform is dedicated to supporting artists and enabling the discovery of new music in a modern digital environment.
music.desc2: Music Sonus represents a space where music — as sound, energy, and emotion — becomes a unifying force that connects people through a shared auditory experience.Where Music Becomes Pure Sound.
